Package cams.dashboards

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
cams.dashboards.Dashboard
public class Dashboard
extends java.lang.Object
The main dashboard user interface for the application. This class is responsible for storing the current state of the user interface, and transitioning between different states (menus) of the dashboard.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private User authenticatedUser  
    private DashboardState currentState  
    private boolean quit  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Dashboard()
    Constructs a Dashboard instance initializing it to the LogoutState.
    Dashboard​(DashboardState state)
    Constructs a Dashboard instance initializing it to the specified state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    User getAuthenticatedUser()
    Retrieves the currently authenticated user.
    boolean isQuit()
    Checks if the dashboard is set to quit.
    void loggedIn()
    Sets the dashboard to the logged-in state (also known as the user's main menu) based on the authenticated user's role.
    void logout()
    Communicates the logout process and sets the dashboard state to LogoutState.
    void request()
    Requests the current state to display its UI.
    void setAuthenticatedUser​(User authenticatedUser)
    Sets the authenticated user.
    void setQuit​(boolean quit)
    Sets the quit state of the dashboard.
    void setState​(DashboardState state)
    Sets the current state of the dashboard.
    void startMain()
    Starts the main menu by setting the dashboard state to the initial LogoutState.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • isQuit

      public boolean isQuit()
      Checks if the dashboard is set to quit.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the dashboard is in the quit state.

    • setQuit

      public void setQuit​(boolean quit)
      Sets the quit state of the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      quit - A boolean to set the quit state.

    • getAuthenticatedUser

      public User getAuthenticatedUser()
      Retrieves the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User.

    • setAuthenticatedUser

      public void setAuthenticatedUser​(User authenticatedUser)
      Sets the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - The User to set as authenticated.

    • setState

      public void setState​(DashboardState state)
      Sets the current state of the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      state - The new DashboardState of the dashboard.

    • request

      public void request()
      Requests the current state to display its UI.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Communicates the logout process and sets the dashboard state to LogoutState.

    • startMain

      public void startMain()
      Starts the main menu by setting the dashboard state to the initial LogoutState.

    • loggedIn

      public void loggedIn()
      Sets the dashboard to the logged-in state (also known as the user's main menu) based on the authenticated user's role.
